title: Metagenome mining divulges virulent and multidrug resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa ST242 and Klebsiella michiganensis STâˆ—1b23 coinfecting an 8-month-old meningitis infant under ICU in Kampala, Uganda, East Africa
